name: soccer?
description:
soccer?

                         an unpolished game made in three day

                                                                                the gameplay was made up as the game was made

                     there was no planning         

                                                         to be honest it's not that good of a game

  you're a big nosed man on a bike trying to play soccer

    arrow keys to move 

score goals with the weird looking ball by hitting the boom box with it

                                                                                try to score three goals

avoid robot

                                                     good job reading this 

                             here is candy
